WorkItem.Description:
In version 2.3.5 and 2.3.6 I have problems with building an upgrade list for my fury warrior.  When I click the Build Upgrade List button on the Optimize screen it will start building the list but then freeze during processing.
Â 
It does not happen everytime and might not happen if the thoroughness is really low.  However, I had it freeze at lower thouroughness as well.  About 75% of the time it will freeze on me and I have to kill the application.  
I am running Rawr in Windows Vista.

Comments.Message:
Can you attach your ItemFilter.xml file (found in your Rawr\Data directory)?  BuildUpgradeList depends on what you have filtered and what you don't.

I'm trying to build an upgrade list on default thoroughness to see if I can reproduce it, but I may not if my filters are set differently than yours (and the bug is on a specific item, which is usually is).

While building your upgrade list I did come across two bugs, which I have fixed.  I didn't have time to re-run the build upgrade list, but try the release tonight and see if you are still having problems.
Here is the filter file as requested.

I ran a "Build Upgrade List" on Orinn.xml with your file filter and full thoroughness using 2.3.8.  This should be fixed from the checkins I referenced on Friday.  Closing this issue, if you have it again, please open a new issue
